description.value:
Relic Standard of the Dark Angels. Any Battle Brother that can draw line of sight to the Standard while it is beared becomes immune to Fear and do not suffer Fatigue.

Requirements

Dark Angels only.

Effect: Famed

Notes: 40 R
description.summary: Relic Standard of the Dark Angels. Any Battle Brother that can draw line of sight to the Standard while it is beared becomes immune to Fear and do not suffer Fatigue.

system.effect: Relic Standard of the Dark Angels. Any Battle Brother that can draw line of sight to the Standard while it is beared becomes immune to Fear and do not suffer Fatigue.
